name: countly
description: Countly is a product analytics solution allowing self-hosted or cloud deployments. It provides real-time metrics, funnels, crash analytics, push notifications and supports SDKs across platforms for complete user behavior insights.
features: Product Analytics: Deep insights into user behavior and engagement. Understand your users completely.
Real-Time Metrics: Live data updates and instant visibility. Make decisions faster.
Funnel Analysis: Track conversion paths and identify drop-off points. Optimize user journeys.
Crash Analytics: Automatic error detection and reporting. Fix issues before users complain.
Push Notifications: Engage users with targeted messaging. Boost retention rates.
Multi-Platform SDKs: Support for web, mobile, and desktop apps. Track everything, everywhere.
